room_title: Escape room "Doomsday Bomber" by Headcase Escape Adventures in Pigeon Forge
room_description:
The city is under siege. Citizens need help from you and your team to find the active militant known as Doomsday. Officials have zeroed in on an apartment complex centrally located within the city. On the outside, itâ€™s an average apartment, but somewhere within its walls lies a device that has the ability to level over two square miles.
Government officials are hoping your team can infiltrate the apartment, then locate the weapon of mass destruction to disable it. You must hurry, you only have 60 minutes to stop this madman from executing his horrific plan!
